title: JupyterLab AI Assistant
description: Settings for the JupyterLab AI Assistant extension

defaultModel.title: Default model
defaultModel.description: The default model to use for AI assistance

maxResponseTokens.title: Maximum response tokens
maxResponseTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in responses

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: The temperature used for generation (higher = more creative, lower = more deterministic)
